snippet.title: Reinforcement learning and approximate dynamic programming for feedback control
snippet.description: Reinforcement learning and approximate dynamic programming for feedback control / Lewis, F Hoboken, NJ : Wiley-IEEE Press, 2013.

Third International Conference on Soft Computing for Problem Solving \- SocProS 2013 SocProS 13 26 - 28 Dec 2013 \- Roorkee, India / Pant, Millie (ed.); Deep, Kusum (ed.); Nagar, Atulya (ed.); Bansal, Jagdish (ed.) The present book is based on the research papers presented in the 3rd International Conference on Soft Computing for Problem Solving (SocProS 2013), held as a part of the golden jubilee celebrations of the Saharanpur Campus of IIT Roorkee, at the Noida Campus of Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee, India. This book is divided into two volumes and covers a variety of topics including mathematical modelling, image processing, optimization, swarm intelligence, evolutionary algorithms, fuzzy logic, neural networks, forecasting, medical and health care, data mining etc. [...] New Delhi : Springer, 2014 e-proceedings (v.1) e-proceedings (v.2)

snippet.title: Real analysis for the undergraduate : with an invitation to functional analysis
snippet.description: Real analysis for the undergraduate : with an invitation to functional analysis / Pons, Matthew A This undergraduate textbook introduces students to the basics of real analysis, provides an introduction to more advanced topics including measure theory and Lebesgue integration, and offers an invitation to functional analysis [...] New York, NY : Springer, 2014.

snippet.title: Learning dynamics explains human behavior in Prisoner's Dilemma on networks
snippet.description: Learning dynamics explains human behavior in Prisoner's Dilemma on networks / Cimini, Giulio ; Sánchez, Angel Cooperative behavior lies at the very basis of human societies, yet its evolutionary origin remains a key unsolved puzzle. [...] arXiv:1401.7287. \- 2014\. Preprint

snippet.title: Neural networks and statistical learning
snippet.description: Neural networks and statistical learning / Du, Ke-Lin Providing a broad but in-depth introduction to neural network and machine learning in a statistical framework, this book provides a single, comprehensive resource for study and further research. [...] London : Springer, 2014.

snippet.title: English for common entrance
snippet.description: English for common entrance / Kossuth, Kornel Succeed in the exam with this revision guide, designed specifically for the brand new Common Entrance English syllabus [...] London : Hodder Education, 2013. - 112 p.

snippet.title: QLab 3 show control : projects for live performances & installations
snippet.description: QLab 3 show control : projects for live performances & installations / Hopgood, Jeromy Used from Broadway to Britain's West End, QLab software is the tool of choice for many of the world's most prominent sound, projection, and integrated media designers [...] Hoboken, NJ : Taylor and Francis, 2013. - 295 p.

snippet.title: Fast sequential Monte Carlo methods for counting and optimization
snippet.description: Fast sequential Monte Carlo methods for counting and optimization / Rubinstein, Reuven Y A comprehensive account of the theory and application of Monte Carlo methods Based on years of research in efficient Monte Carlo methods for estimation of rare-event probabilities, counting problems, and combinatorial optimization, Fast Sequential Monte Carlo Methods for Counting and Optimization is a complete illustration of fast sequential Monte Carlo techniques [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2013. - 208 p.

snippet.title: Distributed model predictive control made easy
snippet.description: Distributed model predictive control made easy / Maestre, José (ed.) ; Negenborn, Rudy (ed.) The rapid evolution of computer science, communication, and information technology has enabled the application of control techniques to systems beyond the possibilities of control theory just a decade ago. [...] Dordrecht : Springer, 2014. (Intelligent Systems Control and Automation Science and Engineering ; 69)

snippet.title: Learning motor skills : from algorithms to robot experiments
snippet.description: Learning motor skills : from algorithms to robot experiments / Kober, Jens This book presents the state of the art in reinforcement learning applied to robotics both in terms of novel algorithms and applications. [...] Cham : Springer, 2014. (Springer Tracts in Advanced Robotics ; 97)
